meta.job_title: Senior Manager, Market Risk Quantitative Analytics

duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyzing data and creating quantitative techniques to automate and enhance new Market Risk systems and models.
Analyzing data from legacy systems to feed into the new PolyPaths risk systems; formulate data requirements for data warehouse; participate in business metadata collection, data quality review.
Building machine-learning analysis techniques to augment risk hedging decisions and improve risk models.
Collaborating with business and technical partners to understand and evaluate their requirements regarding data and determine the optimal way to gather and present data.
Documenting data requirements, data glossaries, data mappings, and data flows and data lineage as set forth in standards.
Profiling source data with a focus on data quality issues and coordinating data quality remediation with business teams.
Producing documentation, procedures, and applicable training materials for new departmental processes.
Writing scripts to extract data from various systems including Data Lake and SnowFlake and compare against data warehouse for ETL feed into the PolyPaths risk system.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Science or Computer Science, Information Systems is required – PhD preferred (equivalent combination of education and experience is considered)
